commits.message: Merge branch 'feature/MB/bloodListFilter' into 'main'
commits.body: feat: [細菌血瓶] 根據點收檢體來源，隱藏血量觀察

commits.message: Merge branch 'feature/HPSAnewChange' into 'main'
commits.body: [HPSA]幽門問卷調整

commits.message: fix: 加入 LEFT JOIN TEST_TV
commits.body: 新增 LEFT JOIN TEST_TV TTV ON D.OD_TESTCODE = TTV.TTV_TI_CODE AND D.OD_TR_VAL = TTV.TTV_TV_CODE

commits.message: fix: 修正 TTV_ABNORM_FLAG 別名為 TTV
commits.body: Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.message: fix: 修正 TTV_ABNORM_FLAG 來源為 TEST_TV 表
commits.body: TTV_ABNORM_FLAG 來自 TEST_TV 表，不是 TEXTVALUE 表

commits.message: fix: 暫時隱藏預覽按鈕
commits.body: 預覽功能待修復，先隱藏按鈕

commits.body: - 新增 TTV_ABNORM_FLAG 欄位查詢

commits.message: fix: 移除 exception StackTrace 顯示
commits.body: 上線前移除詳細錯誤訊息，僅顯示 ex.Message

commits.message: fix: 修正篩檢時機寫死新收、加寬日期及參考值欄位
commits.body: - 篩檢時機改為「新收」(原本誤寫在檢驗原因)

commits.message: fix: 修正預覽 API URL 路徑
commits.body: 從 ../api/Report/GetPrisonReportData 改為 @Url.Action("GetPrisonReportData", "Report")
